page.name: why-you-need-nefs
page.caption: Why use NEFS?
page.heading: Why should you use use the NEFS?
page.summary: If you have enough expert programmers, already have a great-looking user interface for your web application, and your tools already save you from writing repetitive Java and HTML code you probably don't need our Java Frameworks. In case you live in the real world, though, you probably need the NEFS.

page.name: features
page.caption: NEFS Features
page.heading: Features that Jump-start Development
page.summary: Stop cobbling together solutions from disparate open-source and commercial providers. Our Java Frameworks contain everything you need in one integrated suite where everything is guaranteed to work great together. And, when something doesn't work, help is only a phone call or e-mail away.

page.name: architecture
page.caption: NEFS Architecture
page.heading: An Architecture you're Already Familiar with
page.summary: A standards-based, pattern-oriented architecture that follows industry best-practices assures that the NEFS will fit right into your development environment.

page.name: sparx
page.caption: Sparx App Platform
page.heading: Advanced Web User Interfaces Made Simple
page.summary: If you're tired of creating pages of HTML and hundreds of lines of Java code just to allow your user to perform data entry for forms, you need Sparx. Just declare your input fields, page navigation and validation criteria in simple XML files and let Sparx generate all HTML, error trapping, and Java code for you.

page.name: axiom
page.caption: Axiom Data Service
page.heading: Painless SQL Data Management
page.summary: If binding your data to your J2EE application seems difficult, that's because it is difficult. The Axiom Data Service makes JDBC connection management, SQL generation, data retrieval, and reporting painless. Data management tasks that took hours and days using plain J2EE APIs can now be finished in minutes using Axiom's J2EE wrapper APIs.
